casebody.data:
SWAN BEACH COROLLA, L.L.C., et al.
v.
COUNTY OF CURRITUCK, et al. 397A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2017 G. Nicholas Herman, Attorney at Law, Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, for County of Currituck, et al. J. Mitchell Armbruster, Attorney at Law, Lacy H. Reaves, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Swan Beach Corolla, L.L.C., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of December 2017 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2017."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 22nd day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
